net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.handlers

Class HeaderHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.TagNodeHandler
      • net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.handlers.StyledTextHandler
        • net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.handlers.HeaderHandler

  • public class HeaderHandler
extends StyledTextHandler
    Handles Headers, by assigning a relative text-size. Note that which header is handled (h1, h2, etc) is determined by the tag this handler is registered for. Example: spanner.registerHandler("h1", new HeaderHandler(1.5f)); spanner.registerHandler("h2", new HeaderHandler(1.4f));
